SELECT user.nickname , board.* , LENGTH(board.likes) - LENGTH(REPLACE(board.likes, ',', '')) "likeCount" , (SELECT count(*) FROM smile.comment_main WHERE board = board.identity) "commentCount"
FROM smile.user user, smile.board_main board
WHERE board.user = user.identity ORDER BY board.identity DESC LIMIT ${start}, 5
mapper.update: UPDATE smile.board_main SET likes = CASE WHEN likes LIKE '%, ${user}%' THEN REPLACE(likes, ', ${user}', '') ELSE CONCAT(likes, ', ', ${user}) END WHERE identity = ${identity};
